name: Sour Cream Chicken
ingredients: 1-­‐2 cans Cream of Chicken Soup ½ cup shredded cheddar cheese
steps: Spray a 9x13 pan and put ½ bag of Costco chicken tenders in it (frozen). Sprinkle top of chicken with
½ large Costco tub sour cream. 1 tsp. minced garlic
Pour over chicken evenly. Bake at 350° for 2 hours. Serve with rice. I like to caramelize some onions and
